messages.subject: Re: One of my former students
messages.msgSnippet: ... wrote: My e-mail seems messed up.  I might ve messed it up myself somehow, but if anyone e- mailed me on the side yesterday afternoon, maybe try again.
messages.messageBody:
>>>>In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, "Sandra Dodd" <Sandra@S...>
wrote:
My e-mail seems messed up. I might've messed it up myself somehow,
but if anyone e-> mailed me on the side yesterday afternoon, maybe
try again. Thanks. Sandra>>>>>


In case you didn't get my reply to you, here it is again:

Thanks for the paragraph suggestion. I'm going to take care of that
today. My site is at homestead.com, they're like the hosting service
for people who don't know how to build a site. LOL I don't even know
what a source code is.

As for unschooling.com...thanks for mentioning it. I actually meant
for that link to be unschooling.info but must have been distracted
when I added it. I just changed it.

Thanks for all you do...I really do appreciate it!
Joanne

messages.subject: Re: One of my former students
messages.msgSnippet: -=-Sounds like a possibility for something at the Conference...like we had that other storyteller that time in SC.-=- This troubador-one (Beth) is 90 miles
messages.messageBody:
-=-Sounds like a possibility for something at the Conference...like we had that
other storyteller that time in SC.-=-

This troubador-one (Beth) is 90 miles away, though, and not (as far as I know) a
homeschooling mom. There is someone in town who has homeschooled until this year one
of her three is in school (at her husband's insistence), and she's interested in doing a story-
telling session. Ramona King--used to live in Houston, and so some of you might have seen
her elsewhere. Her daughter, Tamarind, won a national storytelling competition a year and
some back.

My e-mail seems messed up. I might've messed it up myself somehow, but if anyone e-
mailed me on the side yesterday afternoon, maybe try again. Thanks.

Sandra

messages.subject: RE: [AlwaysLearning] One of my former students
messages.messageBody:
<<<< One of my former students just put up a really nice site to promote
her storytelling and ballad singing business/sideline:

http://www.newmexicotroubadour.org/new184933.html

I was the 7th grade English teacher of note there.>>>>>

Sounds like a possibility for something at the Conference...like we had that
other storyteller that time in SC.

Robyn L. Coburn

messages.subject: One of my former students
messages.msgSnippet: One of my former students just put up a really nice site to promote her storytelling and ballad singing business/sideline:
messages.messageBody:
One of my former students just put up a really nice site to promote
her storytelling and ballad singing business/sideline:

http://www.newmexicotroubadour.org/new184933.html

I was the 7th grade English teacher of note there.

Cool!

Sandra
